name: 4Chan AwesomeFace
description:
A style closely based on the desu~ style by dmnkn1ght.  Meant to be used with the Firefox Persona "LOLFace" (as pictured in the screenshot).

March 2, 2010: updated because tinypic deleted the old image.
March 2, 2010: updated again because the pic is back, and the replacement pic wasn't the same.
